channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Angel (M24)
channel.desc: A young girl feels dejected as she tries in vain to secure a job. However, things change at Christmas time. Stars KC Clyde.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Making Spirits Bright
channel.desc: Two feuding families must find a way to get everyone to work together in order to win a town competition that could save their both their livelihoods. Romantic drama.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Tale Of Two Christmases
channel.desc: Emma experiences two different Christmases: one where she stays in town and celebrates with a new crush, and one where she returns home to her family. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Mistletoe Secret
channel.desc: Seasonal romance following a ghost writer who arrives in a small town before Christmas and falls for the local Mistletoe Diner's owner.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Deck The Walls
channel.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Boyfriends of Christmas Past
channel.desc: As Christmas approaches, Lauren is visited by the ghosts of four ex-boyfriends. She must learn to open her heart or risk losing her best friend, Nate.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Holiday Crashers
channel.desc: During the holiday season, Toni and Bri decide to shake up their mundane world by creating new identities to crash the Christmas parties from the shop's confidential invitations.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Ghosts Of Christmas Always
channel.desc: Katherine is a Ghost of Christmas Present and she must help one soul, Peter, rediscover his Christmas spirit. But this year has something unusual in store.
